remarks: If the function value for a given argument is not empty, the argument belongs to the support of the function with the empty set as zero. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jul-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 4-Apr-2020.)
statement: fvn0elsupp $p |- ( ( ( B e. V /\ X e. B ) /\ ( G Fn B /\ ( G ` X ) =/= (/) ) ) -> X e. ( G supp (/) ) ) $.
